data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 5
data.actual_result: You can click on this mention and the user profile opens. Also the confirmation message still persists but doesn't work anymore
data.expected_result: The mention shouldn't be clickable (like Desktop client) and doesn't link to the user
data.short_description: Mentions in confirmation messages are clickable and link to the user
data.steps_to_repro: - Write any message which contains a user mention at the beginning (mentioning yourself doesn't work) - Delete this message, pin it or something else that causes a confirmation message - Click on the mention in the confirmation pop-up
